data.actual_result: App crashes System Settings: iPhone 7, iOS 10.2, 1.8.1
data.short_description: Quickly closing out of Server Settings crashes app
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to your server that you are an owner, or have the role permission. - Go to your server's Server Settings- Go to Members - Aim your finger at close/back button. Hit that as fast that you can, as many times that you can. - Watch your Discord App to crash
